parserJSON

new parserJSON()

Source:

Methods

parse(fileName, noRam, callback) → {void}

Convert a json file opened by a path into json.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
fileName string

path of the file
noRam Boolean

if true, it will send the parsed file line by line otherwise, all the parsed file will be send
callback function
Properties
Name Type Description
result string

the parsed file line by line or the entire one
index string

the index of the line if noRam is true
